title: because of the game Clients crashed
body:
I was playing with my friends, picking champ, rank. The game client just crashed, i cant click any champ, then my computer just tell me wait this game or close it. I chose close, my friend told me the room chat shows I left the room,  but they were still in the room, picking champ. it happened many times, after i reconnect, i lost 10LP and need to wait 30mins. 
can someone help me with thatï¼Ÿ I use win7.

replies.body:
Crashes in champ select are often caused by the client dropping its connection to the matchmaking service. Typically this happens if there are issues with your local network configuration that prevents a solid connection from being established. As a first step, I recommend checking out our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps helped.
